#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#define getcx getchar_unlocked
#define putcas putchar_unlocked
#define putcas putchar_unlocked
char stri[20];
inline void scanLong(long long int *n )//fast input function
{
*n=0;
int ch=getcx();
while(! (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9'))
ch=getcx();
while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
*n = (*n<<3)+(*n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getcx();
}
 
inline void scanInt(int *n )//fast input function
{
*n=0;
int ch=getcx();
while(! (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9'))
ch=getcx();
while( ch >= '0' && ch <= '9' )
*n = (*n<<3)+(*n<<1) + ch-'0', ch=getcx();
}

inline void printlnLong(long long int x)
{
int i=0;
do
{
stri[i++]=x%10;
x=x/10;
}
while(x!=0);
while(i>0)
putcas(stri[--i]+'0');
putcas('\n');
} 
int main()
{
int t;
scanInt(&t);
while(t--)
{
long long int n,p;
int i,ans=1;
scanLong(&n);
scanLong(&p);
if(p==0)
{
printf("1\n");
continue;
}
int a=n%10;
int b=p%4;
if(b==0)
b=4;
for(i=0;i<b;i++)
{
ans=ans*a;
}
printf("%d\n",ans%10);
}
return 0;
}
